info.name: my melody yt logo - NOT A STYLISH CSS
info.description:
~ I repeat, NOT ANOTHER CSS, THIS IS  A POST FOR SOMETHING SEPARATE; THIS IS JUST A DUPLICATE OF MY PINTEREST CSS (look in the 'additional info' section
~ this is for public use, but remember to give credits (@jxchu_luv) !! ty wonnies ˚˖?ִ໋?͙֒✧˚.?༘
info.additionalInfo:
<33
~ copy + paste the javascript into Tampermonkey: 
// ==UserScript==
// @name         YouTube Customization
// @namespace    http://your.namespace/
// @version      1.0
// @description  Customize YouTube with your own styles
// @author       You
// @match        https://www.youtube.com/*
// @grant        none
// ==/UserScript==

(function() {
    'use strict';

    // Function to replace YouTube logo with custom image and hide the original logo
    function replaceLogo() {
        var logo = document.getElementById('logo');
        if (logo) {
            // Hide the original YouTube logo
            logo.style.display = 'none';

            // Replace with custom image
            var customImage = document.createElement('div');
            customImage.style.backgroundImage = "url('https://i.imgur.com/hqlbd2d.gif')";
            customImage.style.backgroundSize = "contain";
            customImage.style.width = "95px";// Adjust the width of the custom image
            customImage.style.height = "95px"; // Adjust the height of the custom image

            // Append the custom image after the hidden original logo
            logo.parentNode.insertBefore(customImage, logo.nextSibling);
        }
    }

    // Replace YouTube logo with custom image and hide the original logo
    replaceLogo();

})();
~ enjoy :))
